title: 820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
message:
No water damage, logic board is like new.


This is the behaviour: 

First time when logic board is cold it boots ok and load system. All is working fine. When shut it down it stop working. Fan spins, CPU get hot but no image, no chime. In this momento absolutly all rails are present and ok but still no image. I have already boot with clean EFI but no change. 


PRAM; NVRAM; SMC RESET (also changed it from donot) are done with no changes.

title: 820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
message: The board stays off when you turn it off, or fan remains on?

title: 820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
message:
PLT_RESET_L gos high, when gets stuck and doesn't boot?
Try disconnecting airport and internal SSD.

title: 820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
message: PLT_RESET_L  -3.3 when not boot. ssd and airport already disconnected with no changes

title: 820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
message: How the fault appeared, what said the client?

title: 820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
820-00165 boot first time, after have to wait get cold to boot again
message:
Board stays on, but no image.
Did you test for USB activity?
Test the board without LIO flex.
Check SMC_LID level.
